name: Emoticons Line
description:
Emoticons Line
How to play:
Controlling the smiley face to the smiley faces in the game appear extra point without repeating the steps over.
Try to connect the short and the fastest way to get the most points.
we conducted timers for each plays
you finish with the shortest time will be able to achieve 3 stars
The images in the game are constantly changing makes the game more realistic
lots of emoticons for game

Download and install free
Simple graphics - nice quality FULL HD Graphics
Sounds fun.
Simple gameplay.
Regularly update more new level.
Game download free installation only on Appstore . Consistent with all devices running iPhone and iPad
share with friends via social networking game facebook, google, twitter, sms ....
